Question
========
  
After taking a survey, you want to display a frequency distribution of respondents' religion and age with a histogram or bar chart. Which views are most appropriate? 
Answerlist
----------
* Religion with a bar chart and age with a histogram.
* Religion with a histogram and age with a bar graph.
* Both with a bar graph.
* Both with a histogram.
